author: Lon.TV
description:
Find a Legion Go 2 at Lenovo: https://lon.tv/shrae (compensated affiliate link) and the GMKTek eGPU at Amazon: https://lon.tv/z79bq or direct - https://lon.tv/gvjnb (compensated affilate links) - The new Legion Go 2 handheld has USB-4 ports that are compatible with Thunderbolt eGPUs. See more eGPUs : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f2WleLJSK0Q&list=PLCZHp4d1HnIvM_ot6L7ccOOtavHxL8Y7x and subscribe! http://lon.tv/s
